General.Name: Satis Group S.A.
General.Description: Satis Group S.A., through its subsidiary, produces and sells IT solution in Poland. It offers web and mobile applications; IT HR outsourcing services; integration of IT systems; and other applications. The company is based in Warsaw, Poland.

4.Name: Ms. Natalia  Golebiowska
4.Title: Sec. of the Supervisory Board & Member of the Supervisory Board
